text: 4.9: 2 Kin 17.24; Esr 4.1-5; 9.1–10.44; Neh 4.1-2; Ru 9.52-53; FG 10.28Mba Samaria mbik khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ai, ndu Zuda guma ma. Gu Samaria mbik ma. Ndu thaaŋ nzuav khaŋ na nzuai, ‘Mbɨ thige nan nɨɨŋ, gu mbɨrga’ ? ” Mba mbik mba kameŋ nzuai, ne khaŋ muuŋgi, mbe Zudaiŋ, mbe khurkhuur Samariaiŋ khuui fhu.
